entry.string: Although the Xaraya modules system still recognises the 'old style' modinfo from xarversion.php, we strongly encourage all module developers to re-generate their module's information to comply with the 'new' XML format.
entry.translation: Elthuoogh zee Xereya mudooles system steell recugneeses zee 'uld style' mudeenffu frum xerferseeun. Bork bork bork!php, ve-a strungly incuoorege-a ell mudoole-a defelupers tu re-a-generete-a zeeur mudoole's inffurmeshun tu cumply veet zee 'noo' XML furmet. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Please select the module for which you wish to generate/validate the information:
entry.translation: Pleese-a select zee mudoole-a fur vheech yuoo veesh tu generete-a/feleedete-a zee inffurmeshun:
